buildCommand: curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.3-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && git config --global --add safe.directory /vercel/path0/flutter && export PATH="$PATH:$PWD/flutter/bin" && flutter config --no-analytics && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
